Home_about_us_Text: We are a team with high criteria. We dedicate ourselves fully each day. We love to laugh and supply our bodies with positive energy. We are creative and curious, and we find pleasure in everything that is beautiful. We are convinced that it is equally important to nourish your body, mind and emotions.
About_Minimalism_Text: Find the essence in the chaos of everyday life. Purify it. Enhance the quality of life. Save time and energy.
About_Holistic_Approach_Text: We believe that everything in nature is connected. It is equally important to nourish body, mind and emotions. We strive to widen our perspectives, to stay active and positive, to rely on nature.
About_Essence_Text: Simple and refined design. Carefully selected ingredients and formulas. Handmade. Rejecting everything unnecessary. Leaving only the best.

Ingredients_Main_Title: Gardens say,Slow down, Look around you,Believe, Hope.
Ingredients_Main: KOOZMETIK products are made from top quality natural ingredients from all parts of the world following special recipes and the highest production standards, and abiding all of the domestic and EU certificates. KOOZMETIK products are packed in safe, functional and simple packaging made from 100% recycled paper which protects product quality.
Ingredients_Yes_to_Data: sweet almond oil / jojoba oil / hazelnut oil / grape seed oil / coconut oil / calendula oil / avocado oil / extra virgin olive oil / cantarion oil / apricot kernel oil / macadamia nut oil / argan oil / castor oil / shea butter / monoi de tahiti butter / cocoa butter / aloe vera / natural beeswax / natural collagen / vitamin A / vitamin E / hyaluronic acid / guava extracts / raspberry extract / panthenol provitamin B5 / wheat protein / natural liquid silk / sodium bicarbonate / organic green tea
Ingredients_Yes_to_Essential_oils_Data: lavender / rosemary / geranium / ylang ylang / lime / lemon / lemongrass / bergamot / palmarosa / rose / sandalwood / grapefruit / bay / tea tree / mint / petit grain orange / basil / mandarin / orange
Ingredients_Yes_to_natural_extracts_Data: vanilla / coconut / melon / tangerine / chocolate / strawberry / cucumber
Ingredients_No_to_Data: paraben / lanoline / imidazolidinyl urea and diazolidinyl urea / liquid paraffin mineral oil, vaseline, petrolatum, petroleum / propylene glycol / sodium lauryl sulphate (SLS) / sodium lauryl ether sulphate (SLES) / triethanolamine / dimethicon / diethyl-meta-toluamide deet / artificial fragrances / artificial colours
Ingredients_Image_Data: Truly natural products are always fresh and thus nutritious not only for human bodies, but also for microbes. To preserve these products longer and to protect them from getting spoiled, store them in dry, cold, dark places, and wash your hands before applying them. All products are only for external use. Carefully read the list of ingredients and application method. In case of unwanted reactions stop with the application and consult your physician.
